abstract: Museum of Modern Art prepares for Bjork's complex and immersive multi-media retrospective exhibition.
lead_paragraph: The exhibition, which opens to the public on Sunday, is an immersive sonic and visual landscape, covering more than 20 years of her career.

headline.main: Björk Is on Display, Up Close and in 3-D at MoMA
headline.print_headline: Björk Goes on Display, Up Close and in 3-D

snippet: The exhibition, which opens to the public on Sunday, is an immersive sonic and visual landscape, covering more than 20 years of her career.
